product_name: Spark R&D Dyno DH Hardboot Splitboard Bindings - 2014/2015
long_description: Light and durable, the hardboot-specific Dyno DH splitboard bindings allow speedy, pinless transitions from climbing to descents when you're exploring up and down the powder-coated backcountry.
short_description: Light and durable, the hardboot-specific Dyno DH splitboard bindings allow speedy, pinless transitions from climbing to descents when you're exploring up and down the powder-coated backcountry.
